title: Become a master of Excel, VBA, and Data Science for just $20
content:
Macworld

Being able to work with data is an incredibly valuable skill in today’s data-driven workplace. Having a comprehensive understanding of Microsoft Excel is a good first step. However, there’s an easy way to build upon that knowledge and make yourself invaluable.

With this Excel, VBA, and Data Science Certification training pack, you’ll not only learn how to manipulate Excel, but you’ll also get a crash course in automation and data science. As we gear up for Black Friday, you can get this 13-course bundle for only $19.97 (reg. $429), which could even make an excellent gift for a colleague or student!

This beginner-friendly bundle is taught by Mammoth Interactive (4.2-star rated!). You’ll start with a basic introduction to Excel and gradually raise the difficulty level, getting into charts and graphs, automation with VBA, financial analysis, and eventually, machine learning and data science. Check out some of the courses below:

  • Web Automation with Selenium Python
  • Data Science with Stocks, Excel, and Machine Learning
  • Python for Absolute Beginners and All Ages
  • Excel Financial Analysis
  • The Ultimate Amazon Honeycode Guide: Build 7 Apps
  • And much more!

Give the gift of lifelong knowledge with this comprehensive bundle.

Grab The Complete Excel, VBA, and Data Science Certification Training Bundle for just $19.97 through November 9th at 11:59pm PT. No coupon required!
